Global

Members

poly2tri :module:poly2tri

If you are not using a module system (e.g. CommonJS, RequireJS), you can access this library as a global variable poly2tri i.e. window.poly2tri in a browser.
Type:
  • module:poly2tri
Source:
  • poly2tri.js, line 43

Type Definitions

SweepContextOptions

SweepContext constructor option
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Argument Description
cloneArrays boolean <optional>
 if true, do a shallow copy of the Array parameters (contour, holes). Points inside arrays are never copied. Default is false : keep a reference to the array arguments, who will be modified in place.
Source:
  • sweepcontext.js, line 119

XY

poly2tri.js supports using custom point class instead of Point. Any "Point like" object with {x, y} attributes is supported to initialize the SweepContext polylines and points (duck typing). poly2tri.js might add extra fields to the point objects when computing the triangulation : they are prefixed with _p2t_ to avoid collisions with fields in the custom class.
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Description
x number x coordinate
y number y coordinate
Source:
  • xy.js, line 23
Example
var contour = [{x:100, y:100}, {x:100, y:300}, {x:300, y:300}, {x:300, y:100}];
var swctx = new poly2tri.SweepContext(contour);
